name: Melee: The Evolution of War
description:
The latest Mega Mech 2022 fight simulator is here! Based on realistic physical feedback, experience the thrill of fist-to-fist combat as you fight alongside your buddies to take down the enemy's physical defenses!

Mega Mech Fight

  Experience a gigantic mega brawl of up to 100VS100 Mega Mech Fight, like you've never seen before!

In union there is strength:

  All for one, one for all! You'll be fighting on your own, as well as part of an army, and you'll only be able to defeat the enemy if you take full advantage of your comrades' strengths. Different units have different roles to play, and the clever application of their abilities can outwit and outplay your enemy, and bring victory!

-Boxer: Tested combat experts, can quickly and effectively crush the enemy

-Office worker: Can use different objects in life as his weapons

-Chef: High critical damage, can easily kill the enemy with his sharp knife

-Hunter: The ability to attack the enemy at a distance using a crossbow, working with allies to defeat opponents

-Construction worker: Uses the hammer in his hands to smash the enemy's formation, super high AOE damage

-Knight: Super defense, super damage

Heroes in troubled times:

  Powerful hero units can quickly dismantle the enemy's offensive and defensive lines, and their unique skills can greatly help your army to victory

-Veteran: The special revolver in his hand with its high-tech bullets can penetrate almost anything and kill any creature in seconds

-Superhero: Can use superpowers to jump long distances and shoot enemies while flying, with extremely strong maneuverability

-King: His indestructible shield can block anything, the world's strongest and most absolute defense

Extensive weapon systems:

A multitude of weapons and accessories to upgrade, create the perfect unit just for you, give them the best equipment and make them invincible and unbeatable!

Real physical feedback

Accurate physical collision calculations give you the most realistic physical feedback, so you can experience the battlefield as if you were there, intense and exciting!

Specially optimized hardware acceleration

Using GPU INSTANCING hardware acceleration technology to help render and draw a large number of items, giving you a silky smooth gaming experience!

What are you waiting for? Come build your army and join this magnificent battlefield!
